data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Toluca in the half of Monterrey.
Dorlan Pabon is booked for the home team.
Dorlan Pabon for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 4, Toluca have a goal kick.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Toluca throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 9, Toluca's Michael Estrada is on target but unsuccessful.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 13, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Toluca a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
In the minute 17, Monterrey's Jesus Gallardo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 19, Gaston Sauro (Toluca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Monterrey have got their heads in front thanks to a Rogelio Funes Mori strike.
That's a fine assist from Aviles Hurtado.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
In the minute 27, Rogelio Funes Mori's header is off-target for Monterrey.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Monterrey drives forward and Aviles Hurtado gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 28, Monterrey have a goal kick.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Carlos Rodriguez puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 29, Aviles Hurtado with an assist there.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 32, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Jesus Gallardo (Monterrey) has received a yellow card from Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In Monterrey, Monterrey push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Toluca just outside Monterrey's area.
Stefan Medina for Monterrey has been booked by Alejandro Funk Villafane and receives a first yellow card.
Rubens Sambueza (Toluca) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 37, Free kick Toluca.
Toluca pushes forward through Rubens Sambueza, whose finish on goal is saved.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Aviles Hurtado of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
In the minute 41, Toluca are coming forward and Anibal Chala gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, William da Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Toluca.
Toluca's Michael Estrada misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Alan Medina. .
In the minute 46, Great play from Anibal Chala to set up the goal.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 50, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
In Monterrey Toluca drive forward through Michael Estrada. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 51, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Toluca throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards the away team a throw-in.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
In the minute 54, Attention is being given to Monterreyâ€™s Aviles Hurtado and play has been suspended briefly.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) has taken off Aviles Hurtado who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Miguel Layun is the replacement.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Monterrey are pushing forward but Miguel Layun's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Stefan Medina for Monterrey who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 65, Stefan Medina, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Maximiliano Meza is the substitute for Monterrey.
The home team replace Dorlan Pabon with Daniel Alexis Parra.
Carlos Cisneros is replacing Alan Medina for Toluca at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 66, In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 68, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey's Maximiliano Meza misses with an attempt on goal.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 69, In Monterrey Toluca attack through Michael Estrada. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Carlos Rodriguez (Monterrey) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Maximiliano Meza of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 71, Toluca have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Monterrey.
Toluca are pushing forward but Javier Guemez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 76, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Monterrey's Miguel Layun has been booked in Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 78, Important block from the Toluca defence as Miguel Layun fires in a strike for Monterrey.
Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Monterrey.
Toluca needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 80, Monterrey's Jesus Gallardo breaks free at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Carlos Rodriguez with Eric Cantu. This is the fourth substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Jonathan Gonzalez is replacing Matias Kranevitter for the home team.
Monterrey's Eric Cantu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's second substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Enrique Triverio replacing Alexis Canelo.
In the minute 83, Diego Abella is on a sub for Raul Lopez for Toluca.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Toluca make their fourth substitution with Jonatan Maidana replacing Gaston Sauro.
It's now 3-1 in Monterrey as Rogelio Funes Mori scores for Monterrey.
In the minute 86, Jesus Gallardo instrumental with a fine assist.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 88, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Monterrey throw-in in Toluca's half.
Rogelio Funes Mori for Monterrey gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
At Estadio BBVA Bancomer the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Toluca close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca are coming forward and Adrian Mora gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Free kick Toluca.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
